channel.title: iPhone 4
channel.description:
Reflection on the bumper is a bit too strong, and this is a very amateur model. But yep. Here it is.
[img height=40 width=60]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/1668/iphonefn.png[/img]
[b]Update 1/10/12[/b] [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/9826/iphone4o.png[/img]

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:4, topic:427999”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=530692.msg3875802#msg3875802 date=1325662924]
Lmao I’d love to see that on a server it’d make me lulz for a night
[/quote]
Just a giant iphone in the middle of Varrock, go go![/quote]
This^ xD.

Tbh I would have thought it was real if it wasn’t too perfect(I don’t have an eye for detail). Only bad thing is it looks too wide.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:37, topic:427999”][quote author=mickie456 link=topic=530692.msg3917922#msg3917922 date=1329402941]

maybe i got an idea for this, delete the - friends or clan chat -
and make the iphone with an interface like the phonebook app, so u can choose ppl to “text”

just a thought maybe this can help

What? How on earth will this help the model?

uhmm, make it like it has a function? that was what i ment

…you’re suggesting that I make this model of a phone have phone-like functions?

yes mate
[/quote]
That’s…no.

brb calling kbd

pardon?[/quote]
was a joke, as in a supposedly medieval game cell phones exist and you can call NPCs, in particular bosses.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

I think the borders of the iphone could have a bit more of a silverish tint to it
the screen Looks pretty good otherwise
Just the Borders of the phone (where the antennas are) could be glossy and more shiny
it might make it look a bit more realistic
Overall pretty good

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

the bottom aluminum bumper goes out too far, and the circle and square on the button are out of proportion.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

SilentCJ:

Now the button looks completely out of proportion with the rest of the model, did you not use a reference image and trace?

I did. According to my phone, it looks pretty accurate.

SilentCJ:

How come there’s more of a band on the top and bottom of the device, but it’s very thin on the sides? Should be same width all the way round, which irl is about 1.5mm from the main shell.

The band is a solid figure; it doesn’t actually wrap around, but the black part of the model overlays it, so it’s actually not changing sizes. I’ll Scale it down tomorrow, I’ve got a bit of work to do.

SilentCJ:

About the sharp edges, can you not just chamfer them? What program are you using?

Right now, Cinema 4D. I tried beveling, and the face disconnected from the rest of the model.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Now the button looks completely out of proportion with the rest of the model, did you not use a reference image and trace?
Material looks a lot better.
How come there’s more of a band on the top and bottom of the device, but it’s very thin on the sides? Should be same width all the way round, which irl is about 1.5mm from the main shell.

About the sharp edges, can you not just chamfer them? What program are you using?

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Updated.

The Wanderer:

I feel as if the metak edges are waay too sharp. Maybe it is just me, though. Nice work cole!

Tried fixing this to no prevail. Sorry

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Wrong material on the band, it’s not supposed to be chrome, and the band diameter seems a little too large too, I have one in my deviantart gallery (signature below) which I still haven’t finished :o hehe, mine goes the other way and doesn’t have enough reflection, a material between mine and yours would be perfect.

Geometry looks great though, good job

Read full topic
